metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5845 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Out of bounds access in SwiftShader in Google Chrome prior to 73.0.3683.75 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
